text: Rathish Ambat is a film director active in the Malayalam film industry. He is well known for his debut film Kammara Sambhavam which was released on 14 April 2018. ==Film career== Rathish started his career as an ad filmmaker. He made his directional movie debut through the Malayalam movie Kammara Sambhavam which was released on 14 April 2018. He was the co-producer of the film Ezhu Sundara Rathrikal by Lal Jose. ==Filmography== {| class=wikitable |- ! Year!! width=150|Title !!
